properties.entry: SELECT user_id, user_email, user_nickname, user_regdate, user_is_admin, user_pic, user_link, user_interest, user_introduce FROM "USER" LEFT JOIN user_info USING(user_id) WHERE user_email =? AND user_pw = ? AND user_is_admin = 'Y'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_list WHERE user_is_admin='N'
